name: GhostTown
description:
GhostTown is not a place where it is haunted as usual. This town is the place where the ghosts actually live in. Not only they have their own homes but they live a normal life like we humans do- and have the same problems. You play as the little scout Boo who is new in GhostTown and wants to help the residents. Explore the little town and fulfill the resident's wishes!
